name: AFGBuildableResourceSinkShop
comment: Building where you can buy schematics with coupons

methods.name: GetShopInventory
methods.comment: Get the inventory that holds the purchases we made in the resource sink shop

methods.name: CanInventoryFitPlannedPurchase
methods.comment: Can the inventory fit the items that are received when purchasing the given schematics

methods.name: PurchaseResourceSinkSchematics
methods.comment:
Purchase the given schematics. If any of the schematics give items they are placed in the shop inventory
return true if we could afford all given schematics and non of them are already purchased

properties.name: mShopInventory
properties.comment: The inventory that holds the purchases we made in the resource sink shop

properties.name: mShopInventoryDefaultSize
properties.comment: The size of the inventory that holds the purchases we made in the resource sink shop
